![Community Spotlight | Danny Thomx](https://storage.googleapis.com/papyrus_images/b8a647727632f42dd5cf5f0f715a84e573cf47c2725608578d88202747fd42ca.jpg)

<p>Did you know that Unlock DAO is a decentralized autonomous organization that governs the actual protocol? These are ordinary people, like you, making decisions about the protocol and its future developments in a decentralized manner, utilizing the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://docs.unlock-protocol.com/governance/unlock-dao/">$UP token as a governance currency</a>. DAO Members propose new ideas through proposals and vote on them to help the protocol be future-proof. However, aside from DAO Members, we also have DAO Contributors, Ambassadors, and Stewards. These members have dedicated additional resources and time to the ever-evolving future of Unlock Protocol. Today, it is my pleasure to introduce you to <strong>Danny Thomx</strong>, our <strong>Steward for Technology &amp; Innovation</strong>.</p><hr><h2 id="h-who-is-danny" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Who is Danny?</h2><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/community-spotlight---danny-thomx/f6757a71c5b7a81fbd3ed5e75f9345998cb811bd8377c844c68f81b352bb9aae.jpg" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="3024" nextwidth="4032" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p><strong>Danny Thomx</strong> is a Web3 innovator, developer, and community builder driving the adoption of decentralized technologies across Africa. As the founder of <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://p2einferno.com/">P2E INFERNO</a> and <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/_ethrwanda">ETH Rwanda</a>, Danny has designed gamified onboarding programs, hackathons, and educational initiatives that have introduced hundreds of people to Ethereum and its broader ecosystem.</p><p>His creations include the <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://vendor.dreadgang.gg/">DG Token Vendor</a>, which is an NFT-gated, gamified DeFi exchange where traders progress through stages, unlock perks, and earn rewards. The aforementioned P2E INFERNO App is a play-to-earn education platform that blends quests, XP, and blockchain certifications powered by Unlock Protocol. Recently, he also built a groundbreaking token splitter integrating Unlock, enabling seamless and fast token/ETH distribution to multiple wallets. Try it out for yourself <a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://splitter.dreadgang.gg/">here</a>.</p><figure float="none" data-type="figure" class="img-center" style="max-width: null;"><img src="/images/blog/community-spotlight---danny-thomx/63cb64ecb5add6fa219a047511a5c60d0cc094dfb2514dd3125258c95388b530.png" blurdataurl="data:image/png;base64," nextheight="756" nextwidth="1008" class="image-node embed"><figcaption htmlattributes="[object Object]" class="hide-figcaption"></figcaption></figure><p>Danny's work bridges technical prowess with human-centered design, making blockchain tools accessible to both developers and non-technical users.&nbsp;With a track record of leading high-impact Ethereum events, fostering cross-border collaborations, and building scalable smart contract solutions, he embodies the values of innovation, inclusion, and empowerment in the decentralized space. Whether coding, teaching, or organizing, Danny is committed to expanding the possibilities of Ethereum for creators, communities, and enterprises alike.</p><hr><h2 id="h-get-in-touch-with-danny" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Get in Touch with Danny</h2><p>We believe Danny is a person you may want to get in touch with. Here are some of his social media links to connect with and follow. You will definitely find him to be active via the Unlock Protocol DAO Discord.</p><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://www.p2einferno.com/">P2E Inferno Website</a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://github.com/blahkheart"><strong>GitHub</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://x.com/dannithomx">X</a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow ugc" class="dont-break-out" href="https://farcaster.xyz/dannithomx">Farcaster</a></p></li></ul><hr><h2 id="h-stay-unlocked" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Stay Unlocked!</strong></h2><p>Your Steward for Operations &amp; Coordination,<br>Stella <span data-name="sparkles" class="emoji" data-type="emoji">âœ¨</span></p><hr><h2 id="h-want-to-get-spotlighted" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0">Want to get Spotlighted?</h2><p>Coming soon!</p><hr><h2 id="h-join-us" class="text-3xl font-header !mt-8 !mb-4 first:!mt-0 first:!mb-0"><strong>Join Us</strong></h2><ul><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://x.com/UnlockProtocol"><strong>X</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.tiktok.com/@unlock.dao?_t=ZT-8sqNLXE6lfn&amp;_r=1"><strong>Tik Tok</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/unlock-protocol-dao/"><strong>LinkedIn</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://www.youtube.com/@UnlockProtocol%20Farcaster%20Account%20%7C%20https://warpcast.com/unlock-protocol"><strong>YouTube</strong></a></p></li><li><p><a target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer nofollow" class="dont-break-out graf markup--anchor markup--anchor-readOnly" href="https://farcaster.xyz/unlock-protocol"><strong>Farcaster</strong></a></p></li></ul><br>
